name: To a Grocery and Back Again
name_original: To a Grocery and Back Again
description:
Your parents were fighting bitterly in the process of getting a divorce. Your aunt, however, having heard about the situation, took pity on you and suggested that you take temporal refuge in her apartment, which was conveniently vacant due to her having to work abroad for some months.

The game starts with you, after receiving the key from a sleepy-eyed janitor, arriving at the apartment's door late at night.

Use arrow keys to move & interact

Bitsy by Adam le Doux
Borksy by Ayolland
Music is "By Design" by Internet Club

Thank you for playing
